text: The Swan 112 RS was designed by German Frers and built by Nautor's Swan and first launched in 1999 and was the largest boat the yard had produced at this time until introduction of the Swan 131 six years later. The first megayacht made by this builder, it was luxurious but also designed with ergonomics in mind so that it could be manned by a modest four person crew. ==External links== * Nautor Swan * German Frers Official Website ==References== Category:Sailing yachts Category:Keelboats Category:1990s sailboat type designs Category:Sailboat types built by Nautor Swan Category:Sailboat type designs by Germán Frers
title: Swan 112 RS
